ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: Really... People here take things as too much of a personal assault. I was stating MY observations on skill increases Mike.  I was not attacking anything. But
ygData.messageBody:
Really...

People here take things as too much of a personal assault.

I was stating MY observations on skill increases Mike. I
was not attacking anything. But I think that Verant
programming specific attacks on people's ability to learn is
not something they would do.

There were key words in my answer by the way.

I THINK. I am not stating a fact as they may very well have
done just that, by programming skills not going up on
certain login's...even though I think that would hold no
RolePlay value.

Please people...don't take every answer as a personal
affront. Some of us here are not using English as thier
prime language and their answer may be in the form they
think is not an attack. I try to make my answers as
non-threatening as possible. Maybe I am doing things wrong.

Sorry if any of my answers have insulted any of you.

Good day.
